newsitem.title: JAPAN: Takeda shares rise to financial year high.
newsitem.headline: Takeda shares rise to financial year high.

text.p: Shares in Takeda Chemical Industries Ltd climbed on Monday morning, reaching a high for the financial year.
The share price of the pharmaceutical manufacturer rose 50 yen to 2,460 yen by 0122 GMT. It briefly touched 2,470 yen, a new high for the financial year.
The volume of 1.066 million shares ranked as the second heaviest on the first section of the Tokyo Stock Exchange.
Brokers said volatile foreign exchange movements had sent investors looking for shares such as those in the pharmaceutical maker that were relatively immune to currency gyrations.
"Since the currency market is volatile, drug makers attract investors as a defensive stock, and Takeda is a major issue in the sector," said a trader at a major Japanese securities house.
